title: Raaga Ruby and Polki Pendant
features: This exquisite pendant features a classic floral design, meticulously handcrafted with a central cabochon cut ruby. The surrounding polki diamonds, set in an intricate open-setting, create a stunning display of light. The antique finish adds to its vintage charm. The flower motif is a timeless symbol of beauty in South Indian jewelry.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant red of the ruby and the subtle white sparkle of the polki diamonds.
occasions: and special occasions. Its versatile design also makes it suitable for elegant evening events.
description: This pendant showcases the finest Hyderabadi craftsmanship. The combination of a natural ruby and polki diamonds embodies elegance and tradition. Its timeless design ensures it will be a cherished family heirloom for generations. The rich color palette exudes sophistication and opulence.
